listitem.para: Getting Started : A short tutorial that will get you started quickly.
Core : Main documentation collection explaining fundamental framework concepts, such as modules, configuration, commands, dependency injection, unit testing.
bootique-examples : A collection of simple projects demonstrating the use of Bootique and various modules for typical programming scenarios.
bootique-cayenne : Integrates Apache Cayenne ORM framework, providing easy RDBMS access. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-curator : Integrates Apache Curator in your app, providing access to Zookeeper. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-jdbc : Integrates high-performance Tomcat JDBC connection pool, providing optimized configurable database connectivity. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-jersey : Integrates JAX-RS engine, allowing you to create and run REST web services. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-jersey-client : Integerates JAX-RS-based HTTP client with support for various types of server authentication (BASIC, OAuth2, etc.). (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-jetty : Integrates Jetty webserver and servlet engine. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-job : Integrates a job scheduling and execution engine. Jobs can be run individually or scheduled for periodic execution. Supports instance clustering with Zookeeper. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-jooq : Integrates JOOQ SQL generator for building type-safe SQL queries. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-linkmove : Integrates LinkMove, an embeddable model-driven ETL tool that allows to synchronize data from various sources into your database. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-linkrest : Integrates LinkRest, a powerful model-driven REST framework. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-liquibase : Integrates Liquibase engine that helps you to evolve your database schema via migration scripts. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-logback : Integrates Logback framework to provide advanced logging facility for your app. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-metrics : Integrates Dropwizard Metrics framework to expose runtime information about your application to monitoring systems. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-mvc : Integrates a REST-based MVC engine, and a simple temlate provider based on Mustache framework. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-swagger : Integrates Swagger, a popular REST API documentation engine. (GitHub | Docs)
bootique-tapestry : Integrates Apache Tapestry, a powerful component-based HTML generation framework. (GitHub | Docs)
